mapper.select: select city_id cityId , city_name cityName from city
select district_id districtId , city_id cityId , district_name districtName from district where city_id = #{cityId}
select neighborhood_id neighborhoodId , district_id districtId , neighborhood_name neighborhoodName from neighborhood where district_id = #{districtId}

select 0 seq , city_name name from city union select 1 seq , ci.city_name || ' ' || di.district_name name from city ci inner join district di on di.city_id = ci.city_id union select 2 seq , di.district_name || ' ' || ne.neighborhood_name name from district di inner join neighborhood ne on ne.district_id = di.district_id union select 3 seq , ne.neighborhood_name || ' ' || re.complex_name name from neighborhood ne inner join real_estate re on re.neighborhood_id = ne.neighborhood_id order by seq
